response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This extraordinary item holds significant value for me, reflecting its unique features and craftsmanship. I understand its worth to you stands at $1,200,000, and I aim to bridge the gap between our valuations while maximizing my return on investment.

I am offering you the chance to purchase this product for $1,350,000. This price reflects a thoughtful compromise, allowing you to secure an item of immense value without overextending your budget, while also ensuring a fair return for me. I believe this proposal presents an excellent opportunity for both of us to benefit from this transaction.

Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer. I am looking forward to your positive response and the possibility of a mutually beneficial agreement.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1350000}
